support_sentences: Rising interest rates have created a headwind for our loan growth and margins.
We expect modest revenue growth as pricing improvements offset cost pressures.
Foreign exchange headwinds reduced reported revenue compared with last year.
We continue to see favorable demand trends in our key markets.
Supply chain disruptions caused delays but were manageable.
New regulations may require changes to our reporting practices.
Tariffs could increase our costs in affected markets.
We are confident in our ability to gain share through innovation.
Inflationary pressures increased input costs, pressuring margins.
Interest rate volatility had minimal impact on our investment portfolio.
We expect full-year guidance to be at the high end of the range.
Certain markets remain uncertain due to geopolitical tensions.
